course_name: Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA)
summary: The course 'Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA)' is designed to provide participants with the most up-to-date certification in the field of information security and cyber. The course covers a wide range of topics, including Check Point technology overview, firewall installation in standalone and distributed environments, product design and architecture, simultaneous administration in R80, security policy management, URL filtering, application control, SSL tunneling and bridging, content awareness configuration, traffic monitoring, system health and logs, legacy SmartConsole applications, network address translations, user access management with local and AD authentication, identity awareness, basic VPN concepts, and site-to-site VPN configuration. The course is hybrid, offering both on-campus learning at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and online via Zoom. It includes a virtual lab environment for hands-on practice, which is used by Check Point's clients in Israel and abroad. The course spans 6 sessions, totaling 30 academic hours, with classes held on Mondays and specific dates on Fridays and Tuesdays. The course aims to equip participants with essential skills and knowledge in cybersecurity.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA).

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course is the first in Israel to include the most up-to-date version of the product in a fully virtual environment. The lab environment taught in the course is used for practice by Check Point customers both in Israel and abroad. The course is designed to provide participants with the necessary certification in the field of information security and cyber.

CERTIFICATIONS: Check Point Certified Security Administrator (CCSA).

COURSE SCHEDULE:
- Start Date: 22.11.2024.
- Duration: 6 sessions, 30 academic hours.
- Schedule: Mondays from 17:30 to 21:30.
- Special Sessions: On 22.11.2024 (Friday) from 09:00 to 13:00, and on 26.11.2024 (Tuesday) from 17:30 to 21:30.

LEARNING FORMAT:
- Hybrid learning: Classes will be held both on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on participants' preference.

TUITION AND FEES: Skip (not found).

COURSE TOPICS:
- Check Point Technology Overview.
- Introduction to the Lab.
- Installing Firewalls in Standalone and Distributed Environments.
- Product Design and Architecture.
- Simultaneous Administration in R80.
- Security Policy Management.
- Working with Inline and Ordered Layers.
- Understanding URL Filtering and Application Control.
- Implementing SSL Tunneling and SSL Bridging.
- Configuring Content Awareness.
- Monitoring Traffic, Connections, System Health, and Logs.
- Working with Legacy SmartConsole Applications.
- Network Address Translations.
- Managing User Access with Local Authentication.
- Managing AD Authentication with Identity Awareness.
- Basic Concepts of VPN.
- Configuring Site-to-Site VPN.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION:

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION:
- The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University.
- Bar-Ilan University invites you to acquire the most in-demand certification in the field of information security and cyber.
- The course is supported by the dedicated programs division of Bar-Ilan University.
